name: Frog Jump (World of Pixels)
description:
Info

Frog Jump is an endless runner game about a frog on a big blue lake.

Jump from lily pad to lily pad to get a good score.

Get great skins in the menu. 

Note - please use fullscreen

Game Controls

Hold down the right mouse button to control the jump power and let go to jump

Thanks To
